field_speakers.processed:
Dora Ching (Princeton University)
Annette Julianno (Rutgers University)
Cary Liu (Princeton University)
Lori Wong (Getty Conservation Institute)

field_organizers.processed: The Tang Center for East Asian Art, Princeton University

field_description.processed: In celebration of the publication of Visualizing Dunhuang, please join the Tang Center for East Asian Art at Princeton University for a panel discussion of the Buddhist cave sites at Dunhuang and the Lo Archive of 1940s photographs. Dora Ching, Cary Liu, Annette Juliano, and Lori Wong will share some of the stories behind bringing this monumental nine-volume set to fruition.
